snippet.title: Bashful Adoration | First Look
snippet.description:
Wishlist Now on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3017130/Bashful_Adoration/

Fight for your love in our casual, seriously adorable, PvP fighting game, Bashful Adoration! Battle it out with 2-4 friends locally or online with easy-to-learn, hard-to-master combat as you soar the skies on your broom, and dash and smash props, and opponents until they're a twinkling dot on the horizon. Secure powerups, land devastating blows, and win the adoration of your crush!

You can play our demo RIGHT NOW on itch.io! 
https://kittywampusgames.itch.io/bashfuladoration

Find us on our Instagram, TikTok, X and join our community discord for more updates!
https://linktr.ee/bashfuladoration
